Name: Parapsychology
About the game: Parapsychology is a co-op horror game that can be played with 1-3 people. Find the demon in the house with your friends and destroy it with instructions. Experience horror together with your friends by destroying the demon in a faster and professional way. If you don't have friends, experience this challenging single player game. By opening the voice command in the windows settings, you can contact the devil with the voice command of the game.
